message.body: What time are you riding tomorrow? I can try to come out and we can talk schedule and such. I rode Louie yesterday and today. He feels great!
Running a little behind, but I'll be there soon :)
Hey. I know we made a schedule today but would you mind if I ride Friday this week instead of Saturday? I leave Saturday for Cali and then he is all yours
Sure, no problem! I'll ride him tomorrow & then pick up next weekend.
Ok. Are you ok with that? Tanya is going to let me ride manny too this week so if you want a day during the week on Louie let me know.
That's totally fine with me, no problem at all. I'll let you know about this week, but usually it's dark and cold and I haven't been feeling it after work!
